sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Contact.css' const Contact = () => { return (

Thank you for choosing [Your ShopCart Name] for your fashion needs. We're here to assist you! If you have any questions, concerns, or simply want to share your feedback, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us.

Customer Support:

Our friendly customer support team is available to help you with any inquiries. Feel free to reach out via email or phone. Email: support@yourshopcart.com Phone: [Your Contact Number]

Business Inquiries:

For business-related collaborations, partnerships, or wholesale inquiries, please contact our business development team. Email: business@yourshopcart.com Address: If you prefer mailing us, you can use our physical address: [Your ShopCart Name] [Your Street Address] [Your City, State, Zip Code] Social Media: Stay connected and updated with us through our social media channels. Follow us for the latest trends, promotions, and fashion inspiration. Facebook: [Your Facebook Page] Instagram: [Your Instagram Handle] Twitter: [Your Twitter Handle] Working Hours: Our customer support team is available during the following hours: Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM [Your Time Zone] Saturday: 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM [Your Time Zone] Sunday: Closed

We value your feedback and are dedicated to providing you with the best shopping experience. Your satisfaction is our priority. Thank you for choosing [Your ShopCart Name]. We appreciate your trust and look forward to serving you! Happy Shopping!

) } export default Contact
